@description: Official english translation for the Ommp module
@module_description: This module is intended to manage the configurations of the platform and to host it's static files.
ommp.name#desc: The name of the platform that will be displayed in the titles
ommp.mail_sender_name#desc: The name of the sender for the emails from Ommp
ommp.mail_sender#desc: The email address of the sender for the emails from Ommp
ommp.contact_email#desc: The contact email of the platform
ommp.domain#desc: The domain name where OMMP is installed
ommp.scheme#desc: The scheme used to connect to the site (http or https)
ommp.session_duration#desc: The maximum lifetime of a connection session in seconds
ommp.cookie_user#desc: The name of the cookie that will contains the user id
ommp.cookie_session#desc: The name of the cookie that will contains the session key
ommp.homepage#desc: The name of the module to display on platform homepage
ommp.og_image#desc: The path of the image to use as Open Graph preview
ommp.cache_lifetime#desc: The duration of the browser cache for static files in seconds
ommp.dir#desc: The directory where OMMP is installed on the domain
ommp.recaptcha_site#desc: The Google reCAPTCHA v2 site key
ommp.recaptcha_secret#desc: The Google reCAPTCHA v2 secret key
ommp.homepage_in_menu#desc: Display the module defined as home page in the menu at the top of the page?
ommp.site_logo#desc: URL of the logo to display in the navbar
ommp.favicon#desc: URL of the image to use as a favicon (PNG format)
ommp.trusted_sources#desc: A list of URLs that can be trusted for external modules installations (won't display confirmations for these sources)
ommp.store_url#desc: Link for button to access online modules store, also contains return address
confirm_unlock: Do you want to unlock this right?
confirm_remove: Do you want to remove this user from this group?
user_not_in_group: This user is not in the group
too_few_admin: It must remain at least one administrator
user_must_have_group: A user must be present in at least one group! Please add it to another group before removing it from this one.
name: Name
user_already_in_group: This user is already in this group
group_delete_confirm: WARNING: Do you want to permanently delete this group?
fallback_does_not_exists: The target group does not exists
protected_group: This group is protected, you cannot delete it
invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
invalid_domain_or_ip: Please enter a valid domain name or IP address
invalid_module: Please enter the identifier of an enabled module
path_wrong_start_end: The path must start and end by a slash "/"
config_warning: Caution: Modifying certain configurations may cause instability of the platform or render it unusable. Don't change values you don't understand!
delete_user_confirm: Do you want to permanently delete this user? (this action is irreversible)
cannot_disable_core_module: You can't disable a core module
uninstall_confirm: Do you really want to uninstall this module? This action is irreversible. All module data will be deleted.
cannot_uninstall_core_module: You cannot uninstall a core module
file_too_large_for_upload: This file is too large to be uploaded
invalid_api_json: Incoherent response from API (not a valid JSON)
api_callback_error: Error processing API response by module
unknown_source: You are about to install a module from an unknown source
external_install_confirm: Do you want to install a module from the following source?
url_must_end_with_slash: Each URL must end by a slash "/"
